70244.name: Abominable Lieutenant
70244.text: At the end of your turn, eat a random enemy minion and gain its stats.

67873.name: Amplified Snowflurry
67873.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0) and Freezes the target.

67874.name: Arcane Brilliance
67874.text: Add a copy of a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost spell in your deck to your hand.
67874.flavorText: They could probably do with a dash of Arcane Humility.

73459.name: Axe Berserker
73459.flavorText: All the body spray went to her head.

70015.name: Balinda Stonehearth
70015.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells. Swap their Costs with this minion's stats.
70015.flavorText: Imagine her surprise, ending up in a game called Hearthstone.

71248.name: Battle Vicar
71248.flavorText: She's the most down-to-earth paladin you'll ever meet... until she stands up.

69577.name: Battleworn Vanguard
69577.text: After your hero attacks, summon two 1/1 Felwings.
69577.flavorText: "Welcome to Dun Baldar Felwings! Do you want 'em mild, spicy, or BURNING Legion?"

67778.name: Bearon Gla'shear
67778.text: Battlecry: For each Frost spell you've cast this game, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes. ( )
67778.flavorText: When you get hit by a royally bad pun, you just have to grin and bear it.

67803.name: Beaststalker Tavish
67803.flavorText: Tavish left home to forge his own path. But it still led him back to Alterac to kick some Frostwolf butt.

70025.name: Bless
70025.text: Give a minion +2 Health, then set its Attack to be equal to its Health.

70231.name: Blood Guard
70231.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, give your minions +1 Attack.
70231.flavorText: Has never donated blood and doesn’t plan on ever doing so.

67574.name: Bloodseeker
67574.flavorText: What do you mean shooting them in the back isn’t honorable?!

71241.name: Boomkin
71241.text: Choose One - Restore 8 Health to your hero; or Deal 4 damage.
71241.flavorText: Some Druids consider balance to be a state of harmony between the Natural and the Arcane. Others are more focused on the balance of the opponent’s life total versus their own.

71236.name: Bracing Cold
71236.text: Restore 5 Health to your hero. Reduce the Cost of a random spell in your hand by (2).

70261.name: Brasswing
70261.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies. Honorable Kill: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
70261.flavorText: I’ve seen this before. You just have to time it right to avoid the dragon.

67779.name: Bru'kan of the Elements
67779.text: Battlecry: Call upon the power of two Elements!
67779.flavorText: The elements crackled through Bru'kan's veins and his life flashed before his eyes. He knew this moment would come, but he wondered, had he given them enough?

70005.name: Build a Snowman
70005.text: Summon a 3/3 Snowman that Freezes. Add "Build a Snowbrute" to your hand.
70005.flavorText: This is the coolest spell once you get it rolling.

70226.name: Bunker Sergeant
70226.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.

70282.name: Captain Galvangar
70282.text: Battlecry: If you have gained 15 or more Armor this game, gain +3/+3 and Charge. ( left!) (Ready!)
70282.flavorText: It wasn't the ravages of war that took Galvangar, it was hypothermia.

70320.name: Capture Coldtooth Mine
70320.text: Choose One - Draw your lowest Cost card; or Draw your highest Cost card.
70320.flavorText: We hit a huge haul! Or wait… no, it's just a coin.

68061.name: Caria Felsoul
68061.text: Battlecry: Transform into a 6/6 copy of a Demon in your deck.
68061.flavorText: This is what happens when you keep taking the advice of the little demon on your shoulder.

70264.name: Cavalry Horn
70264.text: Deathrattle: Summon the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
70264.flavorText: The clarion call of the Alliance skipping every objective and going straight to Drek’Thar.

70523.name: Cera'thine Fleetrunner
70523.text: Battlecry: Replace your minions in hand and deck with ones from other classes. They cost (2) less.
70523.flavorText: World Record CTF Champion 16 years running.

67761.name: Cheaty Snobold
67761.text: After an enemy is Frozen, deal 3 damage to it.
67761.flavorText: This one will knock you out cold.

70295.name: Clawfury Adept
70295.text: Battlecry: Give all other friendly characters +1 Attack this turn.
70295.flavorText: The Inept Clawfury is a danger only to themselves.

66874.name: Coldtooth Yeti
66874.flavorText: Its arrival heralds the Brain Freeze Yeti.

70636.name: Contraband Stash
70636.text: Replay 5 cards from other classes you've played this game.

70220.name: Corporal
70220.text: Honorable Kill: Give your other minions Divine Shield.
70220.flavorText: When he’s sitting in the graveyard ready to rez, he’s incorporal.

71292.name: Curse of Agony
71292.text: Shuffle three Agonies into the opponent's deck. They deal Fatigue damage when drawn.
71292.flavorText: Now, fools, you shall all understand my back pain!

71229.name: Deep Breath
71229.text: Deal damage to a minion and its neighbors. (Improved by number of other spells in your hand.)

67759.name: Deliverance
67759.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Honorable Kill: Summon a new 3/3 copy of it.
67759.flavorText: In 30 minutes or less, or else it’s free!

72440.name: Desecrated Graveyard
72440.text: At the end of your turn, destroy your lowest Attack minion to summon a 4/4 Shade. Lasts 3 turns.
72440.flavorText: People are dying to get in.

67209.name: Dire Frostwolf
67209.flavorText: Tips to survive a frostwolf attack: -Stay calm -Lay down -Drizzle steak sauce over your body Brought to you by the Frostwolf Council for Alliance Safety.

70223.name: Direwolf Commander
70223.flavorText: When you’re riding a wolf, it’s in charge and you're allowed to make suggestions.

71234.name: Don't Stand in the Fire!
71234.text: Deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
71234.flavorText: Apparently the “Caution: Hot Surface” sign had burned up.

70203.name: Double Agent
70203.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class, summon a copy of this.
70203.flavorText: And under the Alliance tabard? Another Horde tabard.

71233.name: Dragonbane Shot
71233.text: Deal 2 damage. Honorable Kill: Add a Dragonbane Shot to your hand.

71290.name: Drakefire Amulet
71290.flavorText: "...and I only had to climb up the mountains in Winterspring 50 times!"

67760.name: Dreadlich Tamsin
67760.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Shuffle 3 Rifts into your deck. Draw 3 cards.
67760.flavorText: At a certain point, you stop mocking death and start becoming it.

67204.name: Dreadprison Glaive
67204.text: Honorable Kill: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to the enemy hero.
67204.flavorText: Keep your allies close. Keep your evil demons in your weapon.

66875.name: Drek'Thar
66875.text: Battlecry: If this costs more than every minion in your deck, summon one of those minions.
66875.flavorText: Inside your deck there are two wolves. One is a frostwolf. The other is a frostwolf. You are a Frostwolf.

72807.name: Dun Baldar Bridge
72807.text: After you summon a minion, give it +2/+2. Lasts 3 turns.
72807.flavorText: At least there's no fall damage in Hearthstone.

71321.name: Dun Baldar Bunker
71321.text: At the end of your turn, draw a Secret and set its Cost to (1). Lasts 3 turns.

70003.name: Felfire in the Hole!
70003.text: Draw a spell and deal 2 damage to all enemies. If it's a Fel spell, deal 1 more.
70003.flavorText: Fear not, feebleminded friends, for failure to fell your foes with felfire is fundamentally farfetched!

70118.name: Felwalker
70118.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost Fel spell from your hand.
70118.flavorText: How it feels to chew Fel Gum.

72549.name: Field of Strife
72549.text: Your minions have +1 Attack. Lasts 3 turns.
72549.flavorText: I heard it's lovely there around this time of year.

67886.name: Flag Runner
67886.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
67886.flavorText: I see your argument, but…do you have a flag?

68216.name: Flanking Maneuver
68216.text: Summon a 4/2 Demon with Rush. If it dies this turn, summon another.
68216.flavorText: So, do we have advantage? Can I sneak attack?

76041.name: Forsaken Lieutenant
76041.text: Stealth. After you play a Deathrattle minion, become a 2/2 copy of it with Rush.
76041.flavorText: WE didn’t forsake him. He CHOSE to defend a tower against the entire Alliance front line by himself.

67217.name: Frantic Hippogryph
67217.flavorText: It's killed and it'll kill again!

67833.name: Frostbite
67833.text: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Your opponent's next spell costs (2) more.
67833.flavorText: The sad reality of a raging toothpaste addiction.

70247.name: Frostsaber Matriarch
70247.text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Beast you've summoned this game.
70247.flavorText: They say “don’t poke the bear”, but they NEVER said “don’t poke the frostsaber or her cubs”.

73528.name: Frostwolf Kennels
73528.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth. Lasts 3 turns.
73528.flavorText: The 1 reason Alliance members defect to the Horde is to adopt a cute frostwolf puppy.

70238.name: Frostwolf Warmaster
70238.text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
70238.flavorText: “The spoils of war ain’t free… Unless you’re me!”

67194.name: Frozen Buckler
67194.text: Gain 10 Armor. At the start of your next turn, lose 5 Armor.
67194.flavorText: "Hey, I bet I could shatter this."

70228.name: Frozen Mammoth
70228.text: This is Frozen until you cast a Fire spell.
70228.flavorText: *record scratch* "So, you may be wondering how I got here."

70107.name: Full-Blown Evil
70107.text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Repeatable this turn.
70107.flavorText: This isn’t your average, everyday evil. This is ADVANCED evil.

71231.name: Furious Howl
71231.text: Draw a card. Repeat until you have at least 3 cards.

67375.name: Gankster
67375.text: Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.

71227.name: Gear Grubber
71227.text: Taunt. If you end your turn with any unspent Mana, reduce this card's Cost by (1).

70026.name: Gift of the Naaru
70026.text: Restore 3 Health to all characters. If any are still damaged, draw a card.
70026.flavorText: What do I look like, a charity?

67192.name: Glaciate
67192.flavorText: We now have a more accurate answer to the age-old question "What's cooler than being cool?"

68244.name: Glory Chaser
68244.text: After you play a Taunt minion, draw a card.
68244.flavorText: When you've reached the peak of competition twice, how hard can winning one valley be?

67826.name: Grave Defiler
67826.text: Battlecry: Copy a Fel spell in your hand.
67826.flavorText: She keeps her Fel spells nice and organized in her defiling cabinet.

70243.name: Grimtotem Bounty Hunter
70243.flavorText: He’ll take a big weight off your shoulders.

71230.name: Haleh, Matron Protectorate
71230.text: After you cast a spell, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
71230.flavorText: Oh, how do you solve a problem like Onyxia?

70249.name: Heart of the Wild
70249.text: Give a minion +2/+2, then give your Beasts +1/+1.
70249.flavorText: In each of us beats a wild heart. Except the Forsaken.

66880.name: Herald of Lokholar
66880.flavorText: “I don’t care how hot it is. I am not going over there to be your air conditioning."

71249.name: Hit It Very Hard
71249.text: Gain +10 Attack and "Can't attack heroes" this turn.

70260.name: Hold the Bridge
70260.text: Give a minion +2/+1 and Divine Shield. It gains Lifesteal until end of turn.

67757.name: Hollow Abomination
67757.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Honorable Kill: Gain the minion's Attack.
67757.flavorText: As soon as you land your first Honorable Kill, trust me, you'll be hooked!

71240.name: Horn of Wrathion
71240.text: Draw a minion. If it's a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
71240.flavorText: You can count the rings and find out Wrathion's true age.

67927.name: Humongous Owl
67927.text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

70227.name: Ice Revenant
70227.text: Whenever you cast a Frost spell, gain +2/+2.
70227.flavorText: There must have been some magic in that old ice mace we found.

67243.name: Ice Trap
67243.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, return it to their hand instead. It costs (1) more.
67243.flavorText: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

72460.name: Iceblood Garrison
72460.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all minions. Lasts 3 turns.
72460.flavorText: On weekends, it hosts the local community theater rehearsals.

70204.name: Iceblood Tower
70204.text: At the end of your turn, cast another spell from your deck. Lasts 3 turns.
70204.flavorText: “Why is it called Iceblood Tower?” “Not really sure. Anyways, try not to lose your footing on any of the frozen bodies as you make your way in.”

70236.name: Icehoof Protector
70236.text: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.

67758.name: Impfestation
67758.text: Summon a 3/3 Dread Imp to attack each enemy minion.

70241.name: Irondeep Trogg
70241.text: After your opponent casts a spell, summon another Irondeep Trogg.

70257.name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
70257.text: Battlecry: Spend the rest of your Mana and gain +2/+2, Rush, Divine Shield, or Taunt at random for each.
70257.flavorText: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

71684.name: Kazakusan
71684.text: Battlecry: If you played 4 other Dragons this game, craft a custom deck of Treasures. ( left!) (Ready!)
71684.flavorText: Kazakus had always seemed too clever a sort to bottle a brew that could do him any harm. Perhaps it should come as no surprise, then, that the originator of the Dragonfire Potion was a dragon himself.

71237.name: Keen Reflex
71237.text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Honorable Kill: Gain +1 Attack this turn.
71237.flavorText: All of Onyxia's whelps were no match for Kurtrus' backflip.

70240.name: Kobold Taskmaster
70240.text: Battlecry: Add 2 Armor Scraps to your hand that give +2 Health to a minion.
70240.flavorText: Fabled questgiver of the “Get me candle”, “Get me another candle”, and “Get me 11 more candle” questline.

70258.name: Korrak the Bloodrager
70258.text: Deathrattle: If this wasn't Honorably Killed, resummon Korrak.
70258.flavorText: “I live, I love, I slay, and I am undying.”

66951.name: Kurtrus, Demon-Render
66951.text: Battlecry: Summon two /4 Demons with Rush. (Improved by your hero attacks this game.)
66951.flavorText: "I dedicated my life to vanquishing demons, but I never thought to face the demons in me. Maybe, in time, I can help quell the demons in you." -Kurtrus, to Cariel

70232.name: Legionnaire
70232.text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.

67040.name: Lightforged Cariel
67040.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Equip a 2/5 Immovable Object.
67040.flavorText: Her faith, unshakable. Her shield, immovable. Her enemies, irredeemable.

71252.name: Lightmaw Netherdrake
71252.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Holy and a Shadow spell, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
71252.flavorText: Do you think it's a glass half full kind of Netherdrake, or a glass half empty, inescapable void kind of Netherdrake?

70255.name: Lokholar the Ice Lord
70255.text: Rush, Windfury Costs (5) less if you have 15 Health or less.
70255.flavorText: Suddenly the names of Iceblood Tower and Iceblood Garrison make a lot more sense.

70022.name: Luminous Geode
70022.text: After a friendly minion is healed, give it +2 Attack.

66848.name: Magister Dawngrasp
66848.text: Battlecry: Recast a spell from each spell school you've cast this game.
66848.flavorText: Magister is a humble title for one who united warring armies against the greatest threat to Azeroth.

71254.name: Mi'da, Pure Light
71254.text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle a Fragment into your deck that resummons Mi'da when drawn.
71254.flavorText: Unfortunately, Mi’da’s touch will not turn things to gold.

70245.name: Mountain Bear
70245.flavorText: If they want your picnic basket, I recommend giving it to them.

70027.name: Najak Hexxen
70027.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Give the minion back.
70027.flavorText: "I've got friends on the other side... of the battlefield."

71250.name: Onyxian Drake
71250.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your Armor to an enemy minion.
71250.flavorText: The best offense is a great defense.

71226.name: Onyxian Warder
71226.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
71226.flavorText: Throwing more whelps at the problem might not help, but they certainly will hurt.

67207.name: Pathmaker
67207.text: Battlecry: Cast the other choice from the last Choose One spell you've cast. Battlecry:
67207.flavorText: You can never choose the wrong path if you make your own.

71232.name: Pet Collector
71232.text: Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck that costs (5) or less.
71232.flavorText: "And I'll call you Mrs. Snugglepants, and you Bubblecuddle, and you Cutie Cakes, and you ..."

66887.name: Popsicooler
66887.flavorText: Just passing through Alterac on its way to apply for a job at the Ice Cream Citadel.

70333.name: Pride Seeker
70333.text: Battlecry: Your next Choose One card costs (2) less.
70333.flavorText: When you're putting your head in the lion's mouth, you may as well dress the part.

70263.name: Protect the Innocent
70263.text: Summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt. If your hero was healed this turn, summon another.

71333.name: Raid Boss Onyxia
71333.text: Rush. Immune while you control a Whelp. Battlecry: Summon six 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
71333.flavorText: Onyxia chose her guises to manipulate mortals, but her true form? That was reserved for ending them.

71242.name: Raid Negotiator
71242.text: Battlecry: Discover a Choose One card. It has both effects combined.
71242.flavorText: "What do you mean by aggressive negotiation tactics?" "Negotiations in bear form."

67233.name: Ram Commander
67233.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Rams with Rush to your hand.
67233.flavorText: Get your RAM in pairs for better performance.

70105.name: Ram Tamer
70105.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1 and Stealth.
70105.flavorText: Pump up the ram, pump it up. While your hooves are stompin’.

68262.name: Razorglaive Sentinel
68262.text: After you play the left or right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
68262.flavorText: For the worgen that has everything: more claws.

70202.name: Reconnaissance
70202.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion from another class. It costs (2) less.
70202.flavorText: “But Commander, I already did the connaissance.”

79979.name: Reflecto Engineer
79979.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions in both players' hands.
79979.flavorText: The whole thing's based on the Rubber-Glue Phenomenon.

70103.name: Revive Pet
70103.text: Discover a friendly Beast that died this game. Summon it.

71253.name: Ring of Courage
71253.text: Tradeable Give a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each enemy minion.
71253.flavorText: Now to find the Ring of Wisdom and Ring of Power.

66876.name: Rokara, the Valorous
66876.flavorText: As strong-willed and stubborn as her first day in the Horde, Rokara now wielded a weapon that rivaled even her tenacity.

70011.name: Rune of the Archmage
70011.text: Cast 20 Mana worth of Mage spells at enemies.
70011.flavorText: “It’s not a slot machine! It took YEARS of rigorous studying the intricacies of the universe to unravel the strands of reality. The arcane knowledge alone would enfeeble even the most brilliant of minds. Give it the credence it deserves. It’s a magic slot machine.”

71294.name: SI:7 Smuggler
71294.text: Battlecry: Summon a random -Cost minion. (Upgraded for each other SI:7 card you have played this game.)
71294.flavorText: After a while, Onyxia's regurgitated rats start to taste pretty good.

67756.name: Sacrificial Summoner
67756.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (1) more.
67756.flavorText: Summoning will cost you an arm and a brother.

72810.name: Saidan the Scarlet
72810.text: Rush. Whenever this minion gains Attack or Health, double that amount (wherever this is).
72810.flavorText: An orc mage accidentally kited him all the way from Stratholme.

71247.name: Scale of Onyxia
71247.text: Fill your board with 2/1 Whelps with Rush.

68255.name: Scrapsmith
68255.text: Taunt Battlecry: Add two 2/4 Grunts with Taunt to your hand.
68255.flavorText: Takes the ugly scraps of armor from dead players and combines them into ridiculous looking PVP armor sets.

69986.name: Seeds of Destruction
69986.text: Shuffle four Rifts into your deck. They summon a 3/3 Dread Imp when drawn.

70020.name: Shadow Word: Devour
70020.text: Choose a minion. It steals 1 Health from ALL other minions.
70020.flavorText: Devouring souls is like a buffet. You have to take a little bit of everything.

66939.name: Shadowcrafter Scabbs
66939.text: Battlecry: Return all minions to their owner's hands. Summon two 4/2 Shadows with Stealth.
66939.flavorText: Sneaking behind enemy lines isn't so different from being a line cook. People are hostile, something's on fire, and your only hope is to get out of there with all your fingers.

67193.name: Shield Shatter
67193.text: Deal 5 damage to all minions. Costs (1) less for each Armor you have.
67193.flavorText: "Is the shield being shattered or doing the shattering?" "Yes."

67871.name: Shivering Sorceress
67871.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of the highest Cost spell in your hand by (1).
67871.flavorText: Remember to use your sick days wisely.

71251.name: Shoulder Check
71251.flavorText: One... two... yeah, all present and correct.

67892.name: Sigil of Reckoning
67892.text: At the start of your next turn, summon a random Demon from your hand.

67210.name: Siphon Mana
67210.text: Deal 2 damage. Honorable Kill: Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
67210.flavorText: Why spend mine when I can take yours?

67861.name: Sleetbreaker
67861.text: Battlecry: Add a Windchill to your hand.

70221.name: Sneaky Scout
70221.text: Stealth Honorable Kill: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
70221.flavorText: Do you know what they call Scouts that aren't sneaky? Target practice.

67751.name: Snowball Fight!
67751.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and Freeze it. If it survives, repeat this on another minion!
67751.flavorText: Woahwoahwoah, we said no friendly fire!

67352.name: Snowblind Harpy
67352.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Frost spell, gain 5 Armor.
67352.flavorText: Not snowblind; she can spot a level 51 noob over 40 yards away.

68246.name: Snowed In
68246.text: Destroy a damaged minion. Freeze all other minions.
68246.flavorText: “What do you mean school isn’t cancelled?! It’s a snow day!”

67769.name: Snowfall Guardian
67769.flavorText: You’re finally awake! That fall looked really bad. Demon Hunters? Mercenaries? What are you talking about? Come on, I just unpacked a Golden Moorabi, let’s go build a Freeze Shaman deck.

67237.name: Spammy Arcanist
67237.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions. If any die, repeat this.
67237.flavorText: You don't have to jump while spamming, but it’s more fun that way.

71295.name: Spawn of Deathwing
71295.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion. Discard a random card.
71295.flavorText: Aww, who’s the most dangerous threat to the world? You are!

70024.name: Spirit Guide
70024.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell and a Shadow spell.

71235.name: Spirit Mount
71235.text: Give a minion +1/+2 and Spell Damage +1. When it dies, summon a Spirit Raptor.
71235.flavorText: Bru'kan said his spirit would always be with us. He failed to mention that his raptor’s would be too.

67241.name: Spring the Trap
67241.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion and cast a Secret from your deck. Honorable Kill: Cast 2.
67241.flavorText: Talk about starting off on the wrong foot.

70265.name: Stonehearth Vindicator
70265.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell that costs (3) or less. It costs (0) this turn.
70265.flavorText: “True strength comes from within your deck” is a whole lot less inspiring.

72563.name: Stormpike Aid Station
72563.text: At the end of your turn, give your minions +2 Health. Lasts 3 turns.
72563.flavorText: Known by some as the “Stormpike Naptime Lounge.”

70104.name: Stormpike Battle Ram
70104.flavorText: Baa ram ewe! To your dwarves, your beard, Stormpike clan be true!

70239.name: Stormpike Marshal
70239.text: Taunt If you took 5 or more damage on your opponent's turn, this costs (1).
70239.flavorText: The Stormpike have a very direct take on life insurance.

70400.name: Stormpike Quartermaster
70400.text: After you cast a spell, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
70400.flavorText: Frozen funnel cakes taste just like ice cream, if you pretend real hard.

71244.name: Stormwind Avenger
71244.text: After you cast a spell on this minion, it gains +2 Attack.
71244.flavorText: "I swear if you heal me I will DPS."

67825.name: Tamsin's Phylactery
67825.text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Give your minions its Deathrattle.
67825.flavorText: Eau de Morte. Guaranteed to take your date’s breath away

70262.name: Templar Captain
70262.text: Rush. After this attacks a minion, summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt.
70262.flavorText: You can combine two of these into a Captain Archon.

70488.name: The Lobotomizer
70488.text: Honorable Kill: Get a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck.
70488.flavorText: This may hurt a little, but don't worry, you won't remember it.

70012.name: To the Front!
70012.text: Your minions cost (2) less this turn (but not less than 1).
70012.flavorText: Except healers. You go to the back.

71289.name: Tooth of Nefarian
71289.text: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Discover a spell from another class.
71289.flavorText: Nefarian: Lord of Blackrock, creator of the chromatic dragonflight, victim of several root canals.

70225.name: Tower Sergeant
70225.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain +2/+2.

70235.name: Troll Centurion
70235.text: Rush. Honorable Kill: Deal 8 damage to the enemy hero.
70235.flavorText: Centurion? Ha, come back when you’re a millennion.

70021.name: Undying Disciple
70021.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
70021.flavorText: We get it, you're undead. But jumping out of a grave? That's a bit much.

67894.name: Ur'zul Giant
67894.text: Costs (1) less for each friendly minion that died this game.
67894.flavorText: Nothing personal, tiny human. I have many mouths to feed.

67239.name: Vanndar Stormpike
67239.text: Battlecry: If this costs less than every minion in your deck, reduce their Cost by (3).
67239.flavorText: His favorite modes of transportation? Van, car, board, bike.

67211.name: Vitality Surge
67211.text: Draw a minion. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
67211.flavorText: If your vitality lasts longer than four hours, consult a Priest.

67887.name: Warden of Chains
67887.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Demon that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+2.
67887.flavorText: Can’t stay out too late. I gotta head back home to the ol’ ball and chained demon.

71228.name: Whelp Bonker
71228.text: Frenzy and Honorable Kill: Draw a card.

66953.name: Wildheart Guff
66953.text: Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana to 20. Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Draw a card.
66953.flavorText: Guff faced his biggest challenge yet: making friends on a battlefield.

68187.name: Wildpaw Cavern
68187.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes. Lasts 3 turns.
68187.flavorText: Adventurers were quite confused when they saw how many boots were frozen to the ceiling.

70395.name: Wildpaw Gnoll
70395.text: Rush Costs (1) less for each non-Rogue Class card added to your hand this game.
70395.flavorText: A big fan of four-claw discounts.

67932.name: Windchill
67932.flavorText: The thermometer says it’s 0° right now, but with the windchill it feels like -25°.

70106.name: Wing Commander Ichman
70106.text: Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck and give it Rush. If it kills a minion this turn, repeat.
70106.flavorText: “Mulverick, it’s not your flying, it’s your faction.”

70292.name: Wing Commander Mulverick
70292.text: Rush. Your minions have "Honorable Kill: Summon a 2/2 Wyvern with Rush."
70292.flavorText: “A board full of 2-Health minions? This is what I call a target rich environment.”

71239.name: Wings of Hate (Rank 1)
71239.text: Summon two 1/1 Felwings. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
71239.flavorText: For one day each February, they become the Wings of Love.

67048.name: Xyrella, the Devout
67048.text: Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattle of every friendly minion that died this game.
67048.flavorText: Xyrella thought she was only saving her daughter. Her actions may very well have saved the entire world.
